        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

source.adb7e3c3:
So we checked the death ratio and the active ration and interestingly we saw the state with maximum deaths has not the maximum death ratio that means we need to improve our health infrastructure and awareness in other states 

And also when we checked the active case ratio the three noth eastern states have most active cases that shows how poor the health infrstructure, awareness about covid in north eastern region and this needs to be adressed as most areas in those state are remote areas still we are seeing a high active case ratio

So overall we need to address the health infrastructure in the less developed states and we need to look our north east more and try to develop it more in terms of infrastrusture and health awareness.
